summary: A look at the lives of two teenage girls - inseparable friends Ginger and Rosa -- growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms, and the pivotal event that comes to redefine their relationship.
cast: Christina Hendricks|Jodhi May|Alessandro Nivola|Luke Cloud|Poppy Bloor|Magdalene Mountford|Elle Fanning|Ray Lonnen|Alice Englert|Brock Everitt-Elwick|Max Scully|Marcus Shakesheff|Charlie Smith|Rupert Rixon|Timothy Spall|Andrew Hawley|Ben Wimsett|Oliver Platt|Annette Bening|Aine Garvey|Madison Deluca-Perry|Amelie Deluca-Perry|Rory Finn|Oliver Milburn|Richard Strange|Stephen Boxer|Francesca Bennett|Greg Bennett|Gary Comerford|Philip Harvey|Robin Harvey|Andy Joy|John F. Kennedy|Katherine Moran
keywords: cuban missile crisis|friendship|marital problem|dysfunctional family|marriage problems
title: Ginger & Rosa
